title: Rumble OverHeat Bug
body:
[Gameplay] Rumble rapid heat lose

1. get between 45 and 55 heat generated
2. Cast E twice, W and Q to overheat
3. Cast E while over heated

After you come out of overheat and cast an ability you rapidly lose heat generated and can never maintain heat generated until you reach 0 heat again. its possible to have the heat decay continue infinitely  if you cast 1 ability every 2 to 3 seconds.

replies.body: Thanks for report. Fixed next patch!
I had something similar to this happen to me too. Couldn't figure out what was going on but I suddenly couldn't manage to get any heat for awhile.

So they want him to be in the jungle so much that they gave him a patience bar?

p.s. Just tested it myself it's hella frustrating.
